titles.title: Directing the Secretary of Defense to transmit to the House of Representatives the fiscal year 2010 30-year shipbuilding plan relating to the long-term shipbuilding strategy of the Department of Defense, as required by section 231 of title 10, United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Armed Services. H. Rept. 111-167.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 77.

bill.summary: 6/19/2009--Reported to House amended. Requires the Secretary of Defense to transmit to the House of Representatives, no later than September 15, 2009: (1) the FY2010 30-year shipbuilding plan relating to the long-term shipbuilding strategy of the Department of Defense (DOD); and (2) a certification that both the budget for this fiscal year and the future-years defense program relating to the construction of naval vessels are at a level sufficient for the procurement described in the 30-year plan.
